1/26/99
New Mac driver



A new mac driver has been made available at

ftp://ftp-lc.llnl.gov/west/pub/users/managan/mac.sit.hqx

Two mac window variants are provided. One that allows up to 8 windows and allows you to save or copy each picture as it is finished. The other is for animation; no pausing after each frame is drawn. Finding the Lib directory is a problem right now. You either hard code the location into the library or put an alias of the lib folder into the Preferences folder and rename it to 'plplot_lib'.

1/25/99
New developers snapshot released (990122)


In this version:
  • Formal support for Tcl/Tk 8.0 and Itcl 3.0.1
  • A very substantial patch from Joao Cardoso including
    • Add support for SCO with gcc and shared libs.
    • Add stripcharts
    • Catch Xerrors in plframe.c and xwin.c
    • Allow the -name option of wish to work with plserver in tkMain.c and tk.c
    • allow the wm menager to use a diferent and meaningfull name for its window decoration both in the tk and xwin driver.
    • avoid warning messages comming from plbuf.c !!!???
    • reuse server_nokill in tk.c
    • fix same problems with -display in plserver and local tk interpreter
    • fix a problem in tk.c when the tk driver is working with an iterative program
    • with iterative programs plwindow name is lost. fix in plargs.c
    • make axis more regular in plvpor.c
    • some cosmetics in other files.
You can download it from here.
